bug_description: After deleting a chat conversation, the first AI chat entry disappears unexpectedly. The chat list refreshes incorrectly, causing the top AI conversation to be removed even though it was not deleted.
action: Open the Messages page → long-press a chat item → select Delete → confirm deletion → return to the chat list.
expected_state: Only the selected chat should be removed. Other existing chats, including the first AI chat, should remain visible and unchanged in the list.
